                      • Property Detail

                        • static final java.lang.String JRUBYWAR_CONFIG

                        • static final java.lang.String JRUBYWAR_MAINCLASS

                        • @org.gradle.api.tasks.Input java.lang.String mainClass

                          Setting the main class allows for a runnable War. By default the value is JRUBYWAR_MAINCLASS

                      • Method Detail

                        • @java.lang.Override void copy()

                        • static void updateJRubyDependencies(org.gradle.api.Project project)

                          Update dependencies on the project to include those necessary for building JRubyWar's
